item.title: Funding freeze leaves Fulbright and study-abroad scholars stranded
item.description: The Trump administration paused State Department money for international exchange and study-abroad programs. Participants wonder: Will it ever resume?

item.title: Musk calls Sen. Mark Kelly a ‘traitor’ in response to post about visiting Ukraine

item.title: GOP-controlled Congress seeks to avoid government shutdown early in Trump’s term
item.description: The latest news on President Donald Trump’s return to the White House and the new Congress.
